import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const PSA2 = () => { const [comments, setComments] = useState([]); const [userPhotoBase64, setUserPhoto] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userPhotoBase64') || null); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userName') || 'Your Name'); useEffect(() => { // Load comments from local storage specific to this page const storedComments = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('commentsPSA2')) || []; setComments(storedComments); }, []); // This effect runs only once when the component mounts const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const comment = event.target.elements.comment.value; const newComment = { author: userName, timestamp: new Date().toLocaleString(), content: comment, photo: userPhotoBase64, }; const updatedComments = [...comments, newComment]; setComments(updatedComments); event.target.reset(); // Save comments to local storage specific to this page localStorage.setItem('commentsPSA2', JSON.stringify(updatedComments)); }; return (

Kizumonogatari III: Reiket su-hen

キズモノガタリIII: レイケツ編

"Kizumonogatari III: Reiketsu-hen" is the final installment of the "Kizumonogatari" film trilogy, which serves as a prequel to the popular "Monogatari Series" anime. It is based on the light novel written by Nisio Isin and illustrated by VOFAN. The story follows the protagonist, Koyomi Araragi, a high school student who becomes entangled in the world of supernatural beings.
